FactionDef.label: Anty Invasion-Hive
FactionDef.description:
As the species with genes of ants, they excel at construction and war, especially war of attrition.

They travel everywhere in space and try to settle any planet with a lifeform, whether sapient or not.

The scouting Anties land on the surface first, then rapidly construct bases, and send environmental analysis to the hive waiting in the orbit.

Once the hive obtain the data, they gear up suited for that environment they are to face and drop down to the surface. Then, they start playing out their war.

This Hive is very aggressive. anything that is not a Symbiotic-Hive, they will attack first.

FactionDef.label: Anty Symbiotic-Hive
FactionDef.description:
As the species with genes of ants, they excel at construction and war, especially war of attrition.

They travel everywhere in space and try to settle any planet with a lifeform, whether sapient or not.

The scouting Anties land on the surface first, then rapidly construct bases, and send environmental analysis to the hive waiting in the orbit.

Once the hive obtain the data, they gear up suited for that environment they are to face and drop down to the surface. Then, they start playing out their war.

This Hive likes to mingle with other Hives. But they don't want to mingle with other races at all.

FactionDef.label: Anty Mutant Hive
FactionDef.description: It is a very powerful Hive made up mainly of mutants.
